zone.line: Scattered is the friend ly throng
My body sorrow sounds to unknown multitudes
Thier fortune itself makes my heart anxious,
And what thus otherwise to my sorrow pleases
When it still lives, errs in the world dissipates
And me seized a long ago weaning longing
In this stillness, the first spirit rules
It floats now, in d indetermined tones
My lisping song, the Eolian Harp like
A shuddering seizes me, tears follow tears
This strong heart it feels so mild & weak
What I posess see I now in the distance
And what will me to realityies
